General.Name: Tah Hsin Industrial Corp
General.Description: Tahsin Industrial Corporation manufactures and trades rainwear, garments, furniture products, office equipment, and corrugated boards in Taiwan. The company offers raincoats for motorcyclists, police, children, fishing, mountaineering, sports, sailing, golf, etc.; garments, such as sports casual clothes, wardrobes, bags, winter and summer student clothes, work clothes for primary and secondary schools, and group employee uniforms, as well as suits, sports suits, windbreaker jackets, and casual wear; and rain shoe products for markets, factories, students, office workers, mountaineers, etc. It provides PP corrugated board products that are used in display boards, stationery, recycling bins, packaging containers, moisture-proof bottom panel, and epidemic prevention partition. The company also provides office equipment, including punching and binding machines, and laminators. In addition, it offers TC garments, leather goods, handbags, file folders, plastic film, and carrier bags. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Tah Hsin Plastics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tah Hsin Industrial Corporation in 1970. Tahsin Industrial Corporation was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Ken-Min  Lai
1.Title: VP, Financial Officer, CFO & Chief Accountant
